flawed_nl_solution:
The judge dismissed 2 cases, leaving 17 - 2 = <<17-2=20>>20 cases.
Of the remaining 20 cases, 2 / 3 * 20 = <<2/3*20=40/3>>40/3 were ruled innocent.
One ruling was delayed, so the judge ruled guilty on 20 - 40/3 - 1 = <<20-40/3-1=17/3>>17/3 cases.
#### 17/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 20. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
